channel.title: CVE Feed for Ping Identity -- PingIDM

item.title: CVE-2024-23600|2024-08-13T16:36:41.204Z -- ping%20identity -- pingidm
item.description: Improper Input Validation of query search results for private field data in PingIDM (Query Filter module) allows for a potentially efficient brute forcing approach leading to information disclosure.
